translation.en: [woman] It's 2015, and people still act like marriage
translation.zh:
‎现在是2015年
‎人们依然表现得好像婚姻

translation.en: is some sort of crowning achievement for women.
translation.zh: ‎是女人一个值得加冕的成就一样

translation.en: That is a trap I did not fall into.
Some people prefer to really feel like they're holding a knife in their hands.
translation.zh: ‎…人们更喜欢感觉手中握着刀

translation.en: [woman] I dove in headfirst.
[salesman] Most professional chefs, they prefer…
translation.zh: ‎很多专业厨师 他们更喜欢…

translation.en: [woman] I don't normally quiver for cutlery,
but I'm getting married in six weeks, so here we are.
translation.zh:
‎但我六周后就结婚了
‎所以我们来到了这里

translation.en: -[fiancé] Does that mean it's sharper? -[salesman] Scary sharp.
translation.zh:
‎-这意味着它更锋利吗？
‎-锋利得吓人

translation.en: And she ain't cheap, but she is the superior blade.
translation.zh: ‎这刀可不便宜 但它是上等的刀锋

translation.en: Well, baby, we can't start married life with inferior blades.
translation.zh:
‎宝贝 我们的婚姻生活
‎可不能从劣等的刀开始

translation.en: So you wanna choose a knife that feels comfortable in your hand.
translation.zh: ‎所以你想选一把握在手中舒服的刀

translation.en: What do you think of the Zwilling?
[woman] Snap out of it, psycho.
It's heavier.
[salesman] She has the touch.
I think being a petite woman, you'll find the Miyabi easier to manage.
translation.zh: ‎娇小的女士会认为雅牌更好掌控

translation.en: [woman] I've managed to not eat lunch for six years
just to have this joker call me petite.
translation.zh: ‎就是为了听这个小丑说我“娇小”

translation.en: Petite is what they call short fat girls.
-[beeps] -I should know. I used to be one.
translation.zh: ‎我应该知道 我以前也是

translation.en: Text your mom.
-Let her know we're officially registered. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-告诉她 我们已经登记了
‎-好

translation.en: [woman] Luke Harrison the Fourth played D1 lacrosse at Colgate,
translation.zh:
‎卢克·哈里森 科尔盖特大学
‎长曲棍球甲组运动员第四名

translation.en: kite surfs on Nantucket,
and skis in Vail because Aspen is lousy with the nouveau riche.
translation.zh:
‎在维尔滑雪 因为阿斯彭环境太差
‎全是新晋权贵

translation.en: He calls me "babe" with the finest of intentions.
-Let's go, babe. -Yeah.
Heretofore, it is his birthright to marry a blond insect of Norwegian descent
translation.zh:
‎在此之前 娶一个挪威金发后裔
‎是他与生俱来的权力

translation.en: with a gender-ambiguous name, like Landry or Devon,
translation.zh:
‎有着看不出性别的名字
‎比如兰德利或者德文

translation.en: who can spot my grift a mile away.
translation.zh: ‎距离我很远就能闻到我的虚假

translation.en: Hey, can we get pizza?
Who are you, and what have you done with my fiancée?
translation.zh: ‎你是谁？你对我的未婚妻做了什么？

translation.en: [woman] I'm not to the manor born,
but I have something no trust fund can buy…
translation.zh: ‎但我有信托基金买不到的东西

translation.en: the edge.
It doesn't take much in Luke's world.
translation.zh: ‎这在卢克的世界里不算什么

translation.en: Love your work, hate babies, even the cute ones,
translation.zh:
‎喜欢你的工作、讨厌小孩
‎就算可爱的也讨厌

translation.en: have a few lurid secrets,
and be eternally grateful that Luke knows all of them and still loves me.
translation.zh:
‎因为卢克知道所有的秘密
‎却依然爱我而永远感激

translation.en: [Luke] Um, my mom is asking if the invites went out.
translation.zh: ‎我妈妈问我 邀请函是否发出去了

translation.en: Mm. Yeah, once I approve the font.
translation.zh: ‎对 等我同意了字体就发

translation.en: -Once you approve the font? -Yes.
Oh. Once Ani approves the font.
-Thank you. -[phone chimes]
Oh, she's saying they should go out six weeks before.
translation.zh: ‎她说 应该在婚礼六周前发出去

translation.en: -Jesus, are we at six weeks already? -Yeah.
[Luke] Whoa, we are at six weeks.
[server] All done here?
-Yeah, maybe just a box, please. -Sure.
translation.zh:
‎-对 拿一个盒子吧 谢谢
‎-好

translation.en: -Loo. -[Ani] Okay.
[Ani] Someone once called me an animal.
One wrong move and Luke will see it too.
translation.zh: ‎只要一个行为出错 卢克也会看到

translation.en: You can just take that. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎这个可以收起来了 谢谢

translation.en: Jesus. What happened?
Waitress spilled soda all over the pizza and my dress.
translation.zh: ‎服务员把苏打水洒在披萨和裙子上了

translation.en: [Luke] Oh no.
It's gonna be okay, babe. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎没关系的 宝贝 好吗？

translation.en: Come on, I'll help you.
Baby, I love you.
Oh! Oh my God. -I'm so full. -You hardly ate anything.
translation.zh:
‎-我的天啊 我好饱
‎-你几乎什么都没吃

translation.en: [Ani] Okay, so maybe I keep some secrets from him,
translation.zh: ‎好吧 也许我对他保守了一些秘密

translation.en: but no one has ever made me feel so safe.
translation.zh: ‎但从来没有人让我感觉这么安全

translation.en: [Luke] I'm proud of you for eating carbs, babe.
translation.zh: ‎你吃碳水了 我很为你骄傲 宝贝

translation.en: I wanna see every one of you dripping in sweat.
translation.zh: ‎我想看到你们每个人大汗淋漓

translation.en: Nothing is so bad that you can't do it for ten more seconds.
translation.zh:
‎没有那么难熬
‎不至于再做十秒都不行

translation.en: -[traffic noise] -Ugh! Nineteen minutes? Some people have jobs to get to.
translation.zh: ‎十九分钟？有人要急着去工作呢

translation.en: I mean, not me, but some people.
But I can't be late today.
Oh my God. Are you meeting the documentary director today?
translation.zh:
‎我的天啊
‎你今天要去见纪录片导演吗？

translation.en: [Ani] Yes.
Okay, well, you're not gonna be late on my watch.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 有我在 你不会迟到的

translation.en: [Ani] Nell Rutherford has been fostering me since freshman year of college.
translation.zh:
‎内尔·卢瑟福从大学一年级起
‎就一直在培养我

translation.en: I know you never take the subway.
Oh God, no, no, no. I-I really-- I really hate this.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 不行 我真的很讨厌这个

translation.en: Okay. By your side.
[Ani] Nell is a natural blond with a trust fund.
translation.zh: ‎内尔是有信托基金的天然金发

translation.en: I'm a try-hard former financial-aid kid.
translation.zh:
‎我是以前接受经济援助的
‎很努力的孩子

translation.en: We both hate where we came from.
translation.zh: ‎我们两个都讨厌自己的出身

translation.en: Your mom's coming this weekend, right?
Oh, yes.
She's been to TJ Maxx three times
translation.zh: ‎她这周已经去过三次打折商店了

translation.en: to try to find an outfit for my fitting at Saks Fifth Avenue on the 5th Avenue.
translation.zh:
‎试着帮我找一件去第五大道
‎“萨克斯第五大道百货”试衣穿的衣服

translation.en: Wow, what is the opposite of a legend?
translation.zh: ‎哇 传说的反义词是什么？

translation.en: Okay, I think this one is the most you.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我觉得这个最有你的风格

translation.en: [Ani] What? Only You Pro?
Would you pick it?
I mean, I'm not getting married until we have a woman for president,
translation.zh:
‎我不会结婚的
‎除非我们有一位女性总统当选

translation.en: so I guess we'll know soon enough.
I, uh… I'm still scared I'm making a mistake.
translation.zh: ‎我… 我还是害怕自己会出错

translation.en: Getting married?
No. No, like is Only You Pro the font of a trash slut
translation.zh:
‎不是 感觉“唯你专业”字体
‎是一个不知道怎么递给别人

translation.en: who doesn't know how to pass the salt and pepper shakers together.
translation.zh: ‎盐和胡椒调料瓶的垃圾荡妇字体

translation.en: Oh my God, there is no such thing as a slutty font. It doesn't exist.
translation.zh:
‎天啊 没有什么荡妇字体
‎没有这种东西

translation.en: God, I can't breathe.
Oh my God.
It's okay.
[Ani] Oh my God. Oh my God.
This is normal. Okay? This happens all the time.
translation.zh: ‎这很正常 好吧？这种事经常发生

translation.en: [conductor] We are experiencing a delay… -It's no big deal. -…due to train traffic ahead of us.
translation.zh: ‎我们由于前面的列车交通延误了

translation.en: Thank you for your patience.
-You okay? -[power turns on] There we go. See?
translation.zh: ‎你没事吧？好了 看到了吗？

translation.en: [conductor] Next stop 34th Street-Herald Square.
-And we're moving. Okay. -Oh my God.
translation.zh:
‎-下一站 34街预兆广场
‎-车开了 ‎-我的天
‎-好

translation.en: [Ani] Ugh! Eleanor Whitman. Brought in from The Atlantic
translation.zh:
‎埃莉诺·惠特曼
‎从《亚特兰大》杂志调过来

translation.en: to elevate the overly-sex fashion glossy where I work.
translation.zh:
‎提升我工作的杂志
‎过于性感的时尚光感

translation.en: How was your weekend?
[scoffs] I feel like I ran a half-marathon through Williams-Sonoma.
translation.zh:
‎我感觉我在威廉姆斯索诺玛家居店
‎跑了半程马拉松

translation.en: -Williams-Sonoma? -Yeah.
You should register for a few pieces at Scully & Scully if you can.
translation.zh:
‎你应该去高端家具店斯考利
‎买几样东西

translation.en: I'm sure Luke's family would go in on them.
translation.zh: ‎我相信卢克的家人会同意的

translation.en: [Ani] The fuck is Scully & Scully?
[scoffs] Obsessed with Scully & Scully.
My bedroom sconces are from there.
translation.zh: ‎我的卧室壁灯就是从那里买的

translation.en: [Ani] Eleanor gets to write about topics with gravitas,
translation.zh: ‎埃莉诺能够去写庄严的话题

translation.en: like the wage gap and women in Afghanistan.
translation.zh: ‎比如阿富汗女性的收入差距

translation.en: I'm on another equally important beat.
translation.zh: ‎我写另一个同样重要的专题

translation.en: Your voice, Miss FaNelli…
is simply peerless.
[Ani] This is what sells our magazine.
Apparently men's pleasure is of global importance.
translation.zh: ‎显然男人的快感在全球都是重要的

translation.en: So a recent study in the American Journal of Public Health
translation.zh: ‎《美国公共卫生杂志》一项最新研究

translation.en: found that last year, 30% of sexual assault survivors
translation.zh: ‎发现去年有30%的性侵害幸存者

translation.en: had to pay $940 for their own rape kits.
translation.zh: ‎要自己花940美元买性侵取证套盒

translation.en: That's a girl's whole paycheck.
Right. So I was thinking
"The Real Cost of Sexual Assault" as the cover line.
translation.zh: ‎《性侵的真正代价》作为封面标题

translation.en: Oh! Lavender. Retch.
How about, "When Your Rape Costs More than Your Rent"?
translation.zh:
‎不如《被强奸的花费比房租多》
‎如何？

translation.en: Now that gets us on The Today Show.
translation.zh: ‎这个标题可以让我们上《今日秀》了

translation.en: Miss FaNelli, give me something skanky to keep the lights on.
translation.zh:
‎法奈利小姐 给我一点
‎令人讨厌的东西 让我们吸引眼球

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay.
Let's see, skanky…
Okay, a new study in the Journal of Kinesiology
translation.zh:
‎好 《人体运动学期刊》
‎一个新的研究

translation.en: found that nasal breathing is optimal for sports performance
translation.zh: ‎发现鼻式呼吸最利于运动表现

translation.en: and is used by some of the top athletes around the world.
translation.zh: ‎被世界的一些顶级运动员使用

translation.en: So, "Five Weeks to an Olympian Blow Job:
translation.zh: ‎所以《五周训练奥林匹克吹箫运动》

translation.en: Breathe Like a Top Athlete
to Last Longer and Go Deeper than His Ex."
When I count my blessings, I count you twice.
translation.zh:
‎我数自己遇见多少幸运的时候
‎都把你算了两遍

translation.en: -Draft by the end of the week? -Yeah.
-Thank you, everyone. -[indistinct chatter]
Come with me.
It's gonna be your name on the masthead of The New York Times Magazine.
translation.zh: ‎《纽约时报》刊头上将是你的名字

translation.en: Lower than mine, but it beats a Cuisinart for a wedding gift.
translation.zh:
‎在我的名字下面
‎但是作为结婚礼物 比料理机更好

translation.en: [Ani] I am this close to becoming Ani Harrison,
translation.zh:
‎我就差一点点
‎马上就要成为安妮·哈里森

translation.en: senior editor at The New York Times Magazine,
to becoming someone people can respect.
translation.zh: ‎成为一个别人可以尊敬的人

translation.en: Abstaining from lunch allows me to squat in Eleanor's office when I need it.
translation.zh:
‎放弃吃午餐可以让我在需要的时候
‎偷偷溜进埃莉诺的办公室

translation.en: One day, I'll have a corner office with my own insufferable display
translation.zh:
‎总有一天 我会有在角落的大办公室
‎展示那些让人无法忍受的

translation.en: of prestigious and frankly phallic-looking awards.
translation.zh:
‎有威望的奖杯
‎老实说它们看起来很像阴茎

translation.en: Until then, I pretend I'm important.
translation.zh: ‎在那之前 我会假装自己很重要

translation.en: The rock was Luke's grandmother's.
Oh. Pardon me, his Nana's.
He told me I could reset it in a diamond band,
translation.zh: ‎他说我可以把它重置在钻石手镯上

translation.en: what all the girls are doing now.
Exactly why I will never.
translation.zh: ‎所以我才永远都不会这样做

translation.en: I intend to send a very clear message.
translation.zh: ‎我想传达一个非常明确的信息

translation.en: This is an heirloom.
We don't just have money. We come from money.
translation.zh: ‎我们不仅有钱 祖上全都有钱

translation.en: -Take your best shot. -[door opens]
Hey, Ani. Good to see you again.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 安妮 很高兴再次见到你

translation.en: Sorry to make you come all the way to Midtown.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉让你大老远跑来市中心

translation.en: Katie, thank you so much.
Can you please remind Benjamin that I need the art
translation.zh: ‎你可以提醒本杰明 收入差距的文章

translation.en: for the wage-gap story?
Um, the what story?
[Ani] The smart story I just made up to sound more impressive.
translation.zh:
‎我刚刚编的聪明故事
‎听起来更令人印象深刻

translation.en: Ask Penelope.
-Sit, please. -I appreciate you making the time.
I know you said that the documentary was not the right choice at the moment,
translation.zh:
‎我知道你说
‎纪录片现在不是最好的选择 我明白

translation.en: but there's been a pretty sizable development since the last time we spoke.
translation.zh:
‎但我们上次聊过之后
‎又有了非常大的进展

translation.en: Your former classmate, Dean Barton, has signed on to be interviewed.
translation.zh:
‎你以前的同班同学迪恩·巴顿
‎同意接受了采访

translation.en: [Ani] Keep it the fuck together, FaNelli.
I guess it shouldn't be a surprise he has a new book to promote.
translation.zh: ‎他有新书要宣传 所以这不意外

translation.en: I'm sure you saw his speech before Congress this summer.
translation.zh:
‎我相信你在看到了
‎他今年夏天在国会面前的演讲

translation.en: [Ani] Only 200 times.
No.
Oh, it was a plea to tighten firearm background checks in Pennsylvania.
translation.zh:
‎哦 是为了加强
‎宾州的枪支背景调查请愿

translation.en: [Ani] Your ring. Show him your ring.
translation.zh: ‎你的戒指 让他看看你的戒指

translation.en: I'm afraid I've been preoccupied this summer with planning the wedding
translation.zh: ‎恐怕我今年夏天会忙着计划婚礼

translation.en: and the magazine's initiative with Hillary's campaign.
translation.zh: ‎还有杂志要启动希拉里大选的事情

translation.en: I can't imagine what it's like to have people grilling you about it
translation.zh:
‎我无法想象这么多年后
‎依然有人质问你

translation.en: so many years later.
You're a survivor of the deadliest private-school shooting in history.
translation.zh:
‎你是最致命的私立学校
‎枪击案的幸存者

translation.en: And the reason it continues to captivate public interest
translation.zh: ‎而它持续吸引公众兴趣的原因

translation.en: is because there are still so many questions you never answered.
translation.zh: ‎是因为有很多问题你从来没有回答

translation.en: People wanna know were you a hero or an accomplice?
translation.zh: ‎人们想知道 你是英雄还是共犯？

translation.en: I had absolutely nothing to do with it.
-Then why does Dean say you did? -I don't know.
translation.zh:
‎-那迪恩为什么说与你有关？
‎-我不知道

translation.en: Don't you wanna tell your side of the story?
translation.zh: ‎你不想讲讲你这个角度的版本吗？

translation.en: -[door opens] -Miss FaNelli. Right at home, I see.
translation.zh: ‎法奈利小姐 原来你在办公室啊

translation.en: I need three to five cover line tries for the simultaneous orgasm story
translation.zh:
‎我需要同时高潮那篇文章
‎三到五个备选封面标题

translation.en: by the time I get back from lunch.
LoLo Vincent, editor-in-chief of The Women's Bible.
Aaron Wickersham, independent filmmaker.
translation.zh: ‎艾伦·维克沙姆 独立电影制作人

translation.en: Oh, that's right. I saw your short at the Toronto Film Festival a few years back.
translation.zh:
‎哦 对 我几年前看过
‎你在多伦多电影节上的短片

translation.en: Are you our hot guy of the month for December?
Actually, I'm working on a documentary about gun violence in schools.
translation.zh:
‎其实我在拍一部
‎关于学校枪支暴力的纪录片

translation.en: I'm hoping to talk to…
[Ani] Don't say it.
…TifAni.
I always forget that's your name.
translation.zh: ‎我总忘记 那才是你的名字

translation.en: Ani's pithier.
My team has spent the last year
researching the incident at your high school.
translation.zh: ‎都在研究你高中学校发生的那件事

translation.en: My intention is not to upset you by saying this,
translation.zh: ‎我并不是想说这件事来让你难过

translation.en: but we've uncovered a very different side to the story.
translation.zh:
‎但我们发现了
‎这个故事很不一样的一面

translation.en: I promise you, I'm only after the truth here.
translation.zh: ‎我向你保证 我只是来寻找真相的

translation.en: I give you my word that our work together will not cause you further harm.
translation.zh:
‎我向你保证 我们的工作
‎不会对你造成进一步的伤害

translation.en: [Ani] As long as you get your sensational story.
I'm sorry, but there's just no way that you can promise me something like that.
translation.zh: ‎很抱歉 但是这个你没办法保证

translation.en: What if I said I believe you, Ani?
translation.zh: ‎如果我说我相信你呢 安妮？

translation.en: Thank you.
[Ani's mom] Oh, it looks like a castle, TifAni.
translation.zh: ‎哦 看起来像城堡 蒂芙安妮

translation.en: I always think they're gonna drive nicer cars in the Main Line.
translation.zh:
‎我一直以为在费城主线
‎他们会开更高级的车

translation.en: It's such a hoity-toity area.
[exhales] Mom.
One hundred percent of the students who received this writing scholarship…
-Ended up at a tier-one university. -…ended up…
I know you think I'm a broken record, but college is where you meet the people
translation.zh:
‎我知道这句话我经常念叨
‎但你在大学中认识的人

translation.en: who are gonna be in your life for a very long time, TifAni,
translation.zh: ‎会长久存在于你的人生 蒂芙安妮

translation.en: and the caliber of men is just not there at a state school.
translation.zh: ‎男性的质量是州立学校无法比较的

translation.en: Okay, Mom.
This is it. This is the beginning.
Bye.
You're already the prettiest girl in school.
translation.zh: ‎你已经是学校里最漂亮的女生了

translation.en: [young Ani] Mom! Shh!
[Ani] I spent the first few weeks at the esteemed Brentley School
translation.zh:
‎我在著名的布伦特里学校
‎度过了前面几周

translation.en: navigating the various cliques.
There were the popular kids…
-Hi. -Hi.
…the smart kids,
and everybody else.
Plus the very cool teacher who noticed my talent right away.
translation.zh:
‎还有非常酷的老师
‎立刻就意识到了我的天赋

translation.en: "Holden is what we call an unreliable narrator,
translation.zh: ‎“霍顿是我们所说的不可靠的叙述者

translation.en: someone whose version of the truth can't be trusted."
translation.zh: ‎他所叙述的真相不可以相信”

translation.en: That's a line from the exceptional essay by TifAni FaNelli.
translation.zh:
‎这是蒂芙安妮·法奈利写的
‎优秀论文中的一句话

translation.en: Welcome to Brentley. Congratulations.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎来到布伦特里学校 恭喜

translation.en: ♪ She's a genius in a bottle, baby ♪
-[girl] Stop. -[kids laugh]

‎-你…

Wait! Wait! Wait! Stop! Stop! Stop! [sobbing]
Stop! Stop! Stop! Wait. Wait.

Ani.

Ani!

Okay.
